page.title: 06Churches in North St.Helens
page.content: The United Reform Church in Kiln Lane is around 13 years old. The church is made of brick and sand stone. It has got a cross on the church that was made before the church was built the cross was put on because the church it was on had been knocked down because it was falling down. The cemetary has three Chapels but only one is now used. Two old churches, made of sandstone, are St. Thomas of Canturbury in Denton's Green and St.Davids in Moss Bank. New churches are St.Andrews, St.Patrick's and St.Julies.
